                                        <path d="M8,7 L8,8 L6.5,8 C5.67157288,8 5,8.67157288 5,9.5 L5,18.5 C5,19.3284271 5.67157288,20 6.5,20 L13.5,20 C14.3284271,20 15,19.3284271 15,18.5 L15,17 L16,17 L16,18.5 C16,19.8807119 14.8807119,21 13.5,21 L6.5,21 C5.11928813,21 4,19.8807119 4,18.5 L4,9.5 C4,8.11928813 5.11928813,7 6.5,7 L8,7 Z M16,4 L10.5,4 C9.67157288,4 9,4.67157288 9,5.5 L9,14.5 C9,15.3284271 9.67157288,16 10.5,16 L17.5,16 C18.3284271,16 19,15.3284271 19,14.5 L19,7 L16.5,7 C16.2238576,7 16,6.77614237 16,6.5 L16,4 Z M20,6.52797748 L20,14.5 C20,15.8807119 18.8807119,17 17.5,17 L10.5,17 C9.11928813,17 8,15.8807119 8,14.5 L8,5.5 C8,4.11928813 9.11928813,3 10.5,3 L16.4720225,3 C16.6047688,2.99158053 16.7429463,3.03583949 16.8535534,3.14644661 L19.8535534,6.14644661 C19.9641605,6.25705373 20.0084195,6.39523125 20,6.52797748 Z M17,6 L18.2928932,6 L17,4.70710678 L17,6 Z M11.5,13 C11.2238576,13 11,12.7761424 11,12.5 C11,12.2238576 11.2238576,12 11.5,12 L13.5,12 C13.7761424,12 14,12.2238576 14,12.5 C14,12.7761424 13.7761424,13 13.5,13 L11.5,13 Z M11.5,11 C11.2238576,11 11,10.7761424 11,10.5 C11,10.2238576 11.2238576,10 11.5,10 L16.5,10 C16.7761424,10 17,10.2238576 17,10.5 C17,10.7761424 16.7761424,11 16.5,11 L11.5,11 Z M11.5,9 C11.2238576,9 11,8.77614237 11,8.5 C11,8.22385763 11.2238576,8 11.5,8 L16.5,8 C16.7761424,8 17,8.22385763 17,8.5 C17,8.77614237 16.7761424,9 16.5,9 L11.5,9 Z"/>
                                      </svg>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                    </li>
                </ul>
            </nav>
          </div>
         

          </div>

      <div class="section" id="about">
        <div class="slide-in">
          <div class="slide">
              <h1>About Me</h1>
                <p>Hello, My name is Pawe≈Ç Czarnecki and this is my personal portfolio website</p>
                <p>I'm intrested in Frontend Web Development</p>
                <p>I started learning about Web Development in my School, I passed Practical part of EE.09 Exam with score of 100% and Theoretical part with score of 83%, along with other exam (EE.08), i obtained title of IT technician</p>
                <p>I have already created a few projects. Some of them you can see in "My Work" Section </p>
                <p>For most of my project I use HTML, SCSS and JavaScript, for few I used ReactJS Framework</p>
                <p>For all of my projects visit my Codepen profile or Github respositories</p>
                <p>Below you can download my CV by clicking on button</p>
            <a href="./test.pdf" class="download" download>
                My CV

                file_download
                </span>

                                <h3>Your Email Should Contain:</h3>
                                <ul>
                                    <li>Prefix on left side of @ symbol</li>
                                    <li>Domain name on right side of @ symbol</li>
                                </ul>

                                <ul>
                                    <li>email@example.com</li>
                                    <li>firstname.lastname@example.com</li>
                                    <li>email@subdomain.example.com</li>
                                    <li>1234567890@example.com</li>
                                </ul>
                            </div>

  overflow: hidden;
  margin-top: 3rem;
  padding-bottom: 90px;

  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

  width: min(100% - 2rem, 70rem);
  opacity: 0;
  margin: 0 auto;
  margin-top: 3rem;
  height: -webkit-max-content;
  height: -moz-max-content;
  height: max-content;
  background-color: var(--secondary);

          animation: slide-out-right 1s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both;
}

  margin-left: 2px;

          animation: caret 1s steps(1) infinite;
}

}
.page .slide-in .slide h2 {
  font-size: clamp(0.8rem, 5vw, 1.2rem);
  margin: 30px 0px;
  color: var(--accent-color);
}
.page .slide-in .slide p {
  font-size: clamp(0.5rem, 3.5vw, 0.9rem);
}
.page .slide-in .active {
  -webkit-animation: slide-in-right 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both;
          animation: slide-in-right 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both;
}

  margin: 50px 0px;

  width: 150px;

  background-color: var(--navbar-color);
  border-radius: 8px;

  color: var(--accent-color);
  cursor: pointer;
}

      -ms-user-select: none;

}

.horizontal-scroller {
  margin: 0 auto;
  margin-left: 20px;
  display: grid;
  grid-auto-flow: column;
  gap: 15px;
  grid-auto-rows: 350px;
  grid-auto-columns: 28%;
  padding: 0 15px 15px;
  overflow-x: auto;
  overscroll-behavior-inline: contain;
  position: relative;
}
.horizontal-scroller .skill {
  display: grid;
  gap: 15px;
  margin-top: 15px;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px var(--shadow-color);
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
  background-color: var(--primary);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: 250ms linear;
}
.horizontal-scroller .skill img {
  height: 300px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  inline-size: 100%;
  -o-object-fit: contain;
     object-fit: contain;
}
.horizontal-scroller .skill .description {
  padding-top: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100px;
  text-align: center;
  background-color: var(--navbar-color);
  border-radius: 8px;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -200px;
  transition: 300ms linear;
}
.horizontal-scroller .skill:hover {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(0%);
  transition: 250ms linear;
}
.horizontal-scroller .skill:hover .description {
  bottom: 0;
  transition: 300ms linear;
}

  position: relative;
}

  width: 8px;
}
.work-container .cards {
  display: flex;
  margin-right: 80px;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  max-height: 600px;
  overflow-y: auto;
}

  display: none;
}
.work-container .cards.list-view .flip-card-grid {
  display: none;
}

  width: 100%;
  background-color: var(--elem-color);
}

  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;

  background-image: url(https://picsum.photos/300);
}

  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  text-align: center;
  transition: transform 0.6s;
  transform-style: preserve-3d;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

  cursor: pointer;
}

  overflow: hidden;
}

  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  position: relative;
}

  cursor: pointer;
}

  content: "Click to flip card";
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 3;
  width: 200px;
  height: 30px;
  padding: 10px;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  background-color: var(--navbar-color);
  color: var(--text);

  transition: 300ms ease-in-out;
}

  transform: translateX(0);
}

  color: var(--text);
  background-color: var(--elem-color);
  transform: rotateY(180deg);
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

}

#toggle-social {
  position: fixed;
  width: 25px;
  height: 25px;
  padding: 5px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  background-color: var(--navbar-color);
  transform: rotate(-90deg);
  transition: transform 100ms linear;
  z-index: 20;
  cursor: pointer;
}

  fill: var(--text);
}
#toggle-social:hover svg {
  fill: var(--accent-color);
}

.hidesocial {
  transform: translateX(-100%);
}

.social {
  position: fixed;
  padding-left: min(20px, 1vw);
  font-size: 30px;
  margin-top: 25px;
  transition: 0.2s linear;
  z-index: 10;
}
.social li {
  list-style-type: none;
}
.social li .social-icon-elem {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: 50%;
  transition: all 0.4s linear;
  border: 1px solid var(--secondary);
  background: var(--navbar-color);
  color: var(--text);
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 2px 0 var(--shadow-color);
}
.social li .social-icon-elem svg {
  fill: var(--text);
  padding: 5px;
}
.social li .social-icon-elem:hover {
  border: 1px solid var(--accent-color);
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 0 var(--accent-color);
  cursor: pointer;
}
.social li .social-icon-elem .gmail-info-box {
  position: absolute;
  width: 140px;
  height: 50px;
  left: -240px;
  transform-origin: left;
  transition: 300ms all ease-in-out;
  padding: 5px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background-color: var(--navbar-color);
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 0 var(--shadow-color);
  display: flex;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 5px;
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
          backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
  pointer-events: none;
}
.social li .social-icon-elem .gmail-info-box.active {
  left: 70px;
  pointer-events: all;
  transition: 300ms all ease-in-out;
}
.social li .social-icon-elem .gmail-info-box .gmail-info-btn {
  border: 1px solid var(--text);
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}
.social li .social-icon-elem .gmail-info-box .gmail-info-btn::before {
  left: -10px;
  position: absolute;
  width: -webkit-max-content;
  width: -moz-max-content;
  width: max-content;
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 5px;
  height: 30px;
  top: -50px;
  background-color: var(--navbar-color);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
          backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 0 var(--shadow-color);
  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}
.social li .social-icon-elem .gmail-info-box .gmail-info-btn:hover::before {
  opacity: 1;
  transition: 200ms opacity ease-in-out;
}
.social li .social-icon-elem .gmail-info-box .gmail-info-btn:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
  color: var(--text);
}
.social li .social-icon-elem .gmail-info-box .gmail-info-btn svg line {
  stroke: var(--text);
}
.social li .social-icon-elem .gmail-info-box .gmail-info-btn svg path {
  fill: var(--text);
}
.social li .social-icon-elem .gmail-info-box .goto-btn::before {
  content: "Go to Gmail";
}
.social li .social-icon-elem .gmail-info-box .goto-form-btn::before {
  content: "Go to Form";
}
.social li .social-icon-elem .gmail-info-box .copy-to-clipboard-btn::before {
  left: -30px;
  content: "Copy to Clipboard";
}

.snackbar {
  position: fixed;
  z-index: 20;
  background-color: var(--navbar-color);
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 0 var(--shadow-color);
  width: 300px;
  height: 50px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  bottom: -20px;
  opacity: 0;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  color: var(--text);
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  transition: 300ms all ease-in-out;
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
          backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
}
.snackbar.active {
  bottom: 85px;
  opacity: 1;
  transition: 300ms all ease-in-out;
}

.footer {
  width: 100%;
  height: 240px;
  background-color: var(--secondary);
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  flex-direction: column;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.footer hr {
  position: absolute;
  width: 80%;
  left: 10%;
  background-color: var(--text);
}
.footer .footer-top {
  width: 100%;
  height: 70%;
  outline: red;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-evenly;
  align-items: flex-start;
}
.footer .footer-top svg {
  fill: var(--text);
}
.footer .footer-top .quick-links {
  margin-top: 20px;
}

  color: var(--text);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

  list-style-type: none;
}

  line-height: 0.9rem;
  padding: 2px;
}
.footer .footer-top .quick-links ul li a {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: var(--text);
}

  color: var(--accent-color);
  cursor: pointer;
}
.footer .footer-top .social-links {
  margin-top: 20px;
}
.footer .footer-top .social-links small {
  color: var(--text);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

  list-style-type: none;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
}

  line-height: 0.9rem;
}

  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: var(--text);
}

  background-color: var(--navbar-color);

  top: 80px;

  justify-content: center;
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(6px);
          backdrop-filter: blur(6px);
  overflow-y: auto;
  padding-bottom: 50px;
  transition: 400ms all linear;
  -ms-scroll-chaining: none;
      overscroll-behavior: contain;
}

  list-style: none;

  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  position: relative;

  content: "";

  left: -10px;

  transform: scaleY(0);
  transform-origin: bottom;

  -webkit-animation: transform-and-glow-reverse 300ms linear;
          animation: transform-and-glow-reverse 300ms linear;
}

  cursor: pointer;
}

}

@-webkit-keyframes transform-and-glow {
  0% {
    transform: scaleY(0);
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px var(--accent-color);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scaleY(1);
    box-shadow: 2px 0px 5px var(--accent-color);
  }
  100% {
    transform: scaleY(1);
    box-shadow: 5px 0px 20px var(--accent-color);
  }
}
@keyframes transform-and-glow {
  0% {
    transform: scaleY(0);
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px var(--accent-color);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scaleY(1);
    box-shadow: 2px 0px 5px var(--accent-color);
  }
  100% {
    transform: scaleY(1);
    box-shadow: 5px 0px 20px var(--accent-color);
  }
}

  0% {
    transform: scaleY(1);
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px var(--accent-color);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scaleY(1);
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px var(--accent-color);
  }
  100% {
    transform: scaleY(0);
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px var(--accent-color);
  }
}

.wrapper {
  width: 350px;
  padding: 25px 30px;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
  border-radius: 15px;
  background: var(--elem-color);
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 15px var(--shadow-color);
}
.wrapper.minimalized {
  height: 80px;
  width: 80px;
  overflow: visible;
  border-radius: 8px;
  transition: all 300ms linear;
}
.wrapper.minimalized .music-list {
  display: none;
}
.wrapper.minimalized.paused .img-area {
  -webkit-animation: rotate 2s linear infinite;
          animation: rotate 2s linear infinite;
  -webkit-animation-play-state: paused;
          animation-play-state: paused;
}
.wrapper.minimalized .top-bar {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
}
.wrapper.minimalized .top-bar .material-icons, .wrapper.minimalized .top-bar span {
  display: none;
}
.wrapper.minimalized .top-bar .minimalize {
  display: block;
  margin-top: -30px;
  margin-left: -30px;
  opacity: 0;
}
.wrapper.minimalized .img-area {
  height: 50px;
  width: 50px;
  left: 20%;
  top: 0;
  margin-top: 15px;
  position: absolute;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 1px solid var(--accent-color);
  -webkit-animation-play-state: running;
          animation-play-state: running;
}
.wrapper.minimalized .img-area .dot {
  border: 2px solid var(--accent-color);
  background-color: var(--elem-color);
  width: 15px;
  height: 15px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 1;
}
.wrapper.minimalized .img-area img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  -o-object-fit: cover;
     object-fit: cover;
  filter: grayscale(100%);
}
.wrapper.minimalized .song-details {
  opacity: 0;
  position: absolute;
  height: 50px;
  top: -5px;
  color: #929292;
  left: 90px;
  text-align: left;
}
.wrapper.minimalized .song-details .name {
  font-size: 14px;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: 30px;
  line-height: 1;
  overflow: hidden;
  white-space: nowrap;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
}
.wrapper.minimalized .song-details .artist {
  margin-top: -10px;
  font-size: 12px;
  line-height: normal;
}

  transition: all 300ms linear;
  width: 350px;
  opacity: 1;
}

  opacity: 1;
  width: 150px;
}

  opacity: 1;
  width: 80px;
}

  left: 5%;
  -webkit-animation-play-state: running;
          animation-play-state: running;
}

  display: flex;
}

  display: block;
}

  display: none;
  margin-top: -25px;
  width: 100%;
  margin-left: 0px;
}
.wrapper.minimalized .song-timer {
  display: none;
}

  position: absolute;
  right: 25px;
  width: 20%;
  margin-left: 0px;
  margin-top: 15px;
  display: none;
}

  font-size: 24px;
}

  display: none;
}

  margin: 0 35px;
}

  width: 30px;
  height: 30px;
}
.wrapper i {
  cursor: pointer;
}

  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

  color: var(--text);

}

  margin-left: -3px;
  color: var(--text);

  width: 100%;

  overflow: hidden;

  box-shadow: 0px 6px 12px var(--shadow-color);
}

  height: 100%;
  -o-object-fit: cover;
     object-fit: cover;

  width: 100%;

  height: inherit;
  width: 0%;

  border-radius: inherit;
  background: var(--accent-color);

  content: "";

  pointer-events: auto;

          background-clip: text;

}

  position: absolute;
  background: var(--navbar-color);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
          backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
  width: 100%;
  left: 0;
  top: 100%;
  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
  z-index: 5;

  border-radius: 15px;
  box-shadow: 0px -5px 10px var(--shadow-color);
  transition: all 0.15s ease-out;
}

  top: 45%;
  opacity: 1;
  pointer-events: auto;
}

  display: flex;

}

  width: 5px;
  height: 100%;
  -webkit-animation: volume 0.3s linear infinite alternate;
          animation: volume 0.3s linear infinite alternate;
}

  width: 5px;
  height: 100%;
  -webkit-animation: volume 0.3s linear infinite alternate;
          animation: volume 0.3s linear infinite alternate;
}
.wrapper.paused .playing-anim .bar__3 {
  width: 5px;
  height: 100%;
  -webkit-animation: volume 0.3s linear infinite alternate;
          animation: volume 0.3s linear infinite alternate;
}
.wrapper.paused .playing-anim .bar__4 {
  width: 5px;
  height: 100%;
  -webkit-animation: volume 0.3s linear infinite alternate;
          animation: volume 0.3s linear infinite alternate;
}
.wrapper.paused .playing-anim .bar__1 {
  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.4s;
          animation-delay: 0.4s;
}
.wrapper.paused .playing-anim .bar__2 {
  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.2s;
          animation-delay: 0.2s;
}
.wrapper.paused .playing-anim .bar__3 {
  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.9s;
          animation-delay: 0.9s;
}
.wrapper.paused .playing-anim .bar__4 {
  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.6s;
          animation-delay: 0.6s;
}
/*# sourceMappingURL=style.css.map */
window.addEventListener('load', () => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    document.querySelector('.preload').classList.add('preload-finished')
    setTimeout(() => {
      typeWriter()
    }, 1100)
  }, 1000);
});

/////////////// Theme Dropdown //////////////////////





const dropdown = () => {
    document.getElementById("dropdown").classList.toggle("show");
}
window.addEventListener('click', function(e){
  if (!document.getElementById('dropdown').contains(e.target) && (!document.getElementById('dropbtn').contains(e.target))) {
   document.getElementById('dropdown').classList.remove('show');
} 



  ///////////// Side nav ///////////////////////
  if (!document.getElementById('toggle-menu').contains(e.target) && (!document.getElementById('side-nav').contains(e.target))) {
    document.getElementById('side-nav').classList.add('hide');
  } 
  let hide = document.querySelector('.hide')
  let wrapperMenu = document.querySelector('.wrapper-menu');
  

  if(document.getElementById('side-nav').contains(hide)){
    wrapperMenu.classList.remove('open');
  }
  else{
    wrapperMenu.classList.add('open');
  }
})

toggleSideMenu = () => {
  document.querySelector('.nav').classList.toggle('hide');
}





///////////////////  Back to Top Button //////////////////


window.onscroll = function() {
  scrollFunction()
}

const scrollFunction = () => {
  if (document.body.scrollTop > 300 || document.documentElement.scrollTop > 300) {
    document.getElementById("myBtn").classList.add('showScroll');
    // console.log('scrolling')
  } else {
    document.getElementById("myBtn").classList.remove('showScroll');
  }
}
const scrollToTop = () => {
  document.body.scrollTop = 0;
  document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0;
}





/////////////////////////////// Type Writer ///////////////////



const message = ['Hello, my name is Pawe≈Ç, and this is my website.']
let textPosition = 0
const speed = 100

const typeWriter = () => {
  document.querySelector('#message').innerHTML = message[0].substring(0, textPosition) + ' <span class="caret"></span>'

  if(textPosition++ != message[0].length){
    setTimeout(typeWriter, speed)
  }
}





///////////////  Theme Switcher //////////////////
let root = document.documentElement;
const themes = `[
  {
    "id": "dark",
    "name": "Dark Theme",
    "colors": {
        "primary": "#2e2e2e",
        "secondary": "#252525",
        "elemColor": "#1b1b1b",
        "navbarColor": "rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.9)",
        "text": "#b8b8b8",
        "accentColor": "rgb(146, 146, 146)",
        "shadowColor": "rgba(24, 24, 24, 0.719)",
        "scrollbarColor": "#222222",
        "scrollBarColorHover": "#1f1f1f",
        "scrollBarTrackColor": "#292929"
    }
},

{
  "id": "light",
  "name": "Light Theme",
  "colors": {
      "primary": "rgb(238, 238, 238)",
      "secondary": "#e9e9e9",
      "elemColor": "#f6f6f6",
      "navbarColor": "rgba(246, 246, 246, 0.9)",
      "text": "#181818",
      "accentColor": "#333",
      "shadowColor": "rgba(170, 170, 170, 0.719)",
      "scrollbarColor": "#bebebe",

      "scrollBarTrackColor": "#d4d4d4"

      "name": "Dark Blue Theme",
      "colors": {
          "primary": "#2e2e2e",
          "secondary": "#252525",
          "elemColor": "#1b1b1b",
          "navbarColor": "rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.9)",
          "text": "#b8b8b8",
          "accentColor": "rgb(45, 104, 200)",
          "shadowColor": "rgba(24, 24, 24, 0.719)",
          "scrollbarColor": "#222222",
          "scrollBarColorHover": "#1f1f1f",
          "scrollBarTrackColor": "#292929"
      }
  },

    "id": "light-blue",
    "name": "Light Blue Theme",
    "colors": {
        "primary": "rgb(238, 238, 238)",
        "secondary": "#e9e9e9",
        "elemColor": "#f6f6f6",
        "navbarColor": "rgba(246, 246, 246, 0.9)",

      "scrollBarTrackColor": "#292929"

    "id": "light-green",
    "name": "Light Green Theme",
    "colors": {
      "primary": "rgb(238, 238, 238)",
      "secondary": "#e9e9e9",
      "elemColor": "#f6f6f6",

    "id": "dark-purple",
    "name": "Dark Purple Theme",
    "colors": {
      "primary": "#2e2e2e",
      "secondary": "#252525",
      "elemColor": "#1b1b1b",
      "navbarColor": "rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.9)",
      "text": "#b8b8b8",
      "accentColor": "#b91bb9",
      "shadowColor": "rgba(24, 24, 24, 0.719)",
      "scrollbarColor": "#222222",
      "scrollBarColorHover": "#1f1f1f",
      "scrollBarTrackColor": "#292929"
  }
},

{
    "id": "light-purple",
    "name": "Light Purple Theme",
    "colors": {
      "primary": "rgb(238, 238, 238)",
      "secondary": "#e9e9e9",
      "elemColor": "#f6f6f6",
      "navbarColor": "rgba(246, 246, 246, 0.9)",
      "text": "#181818",
      "accentColor": "#880188",
      "shadowColor": "rgba(170, 170, 170, 0.719)",
      "scrollbarColor": "#bebebe",
      "scrollBarColorHover": "#aaaaaa",
      "scrollBarTrackColor": "#d4d4d4"
  }
},

{
    "id": "dark-orange",
    "name": "Dark Orange Theme",
    "colors": {
      "primary": "#2e2e2e",
      "secondary": "#252525",
      "elemColor": "#1b1b1b",
      "navbarColor": "rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.9)",
      "text": "#b8b8b8",
      "accentColor": "#ffa600",
      "shadowColor": "rgba(24, 24, 24, 0.719)",
      "scrollbarColor": "#222222",
      "scrollBarColorHover": "#1f1f1f",
      "scrollBarTrackColor": "#292929"
  }
},

{
    "id": "light-orange",
    "name": "Light Orange Theme",
    "colors": {
      "primary": "rgb(238, 238, 238)",
      "secondary": "#e9e9e9",
      "elemColor": "#f6f6f6",
      "navbarColor": "rgba(246, 246, 246, 0.9)",
      "text": "#181818",
      "accentColor": "#ffa600",
      "shadowColor": "rgba(170, 170, 170, 0.719)",
      "scrollbarColor": "#bebebe",
      "scrollBarColorHover": "#aaaaaa",
      "scrollBarTrackColor": "#d4d4d4"
  }
}
]`
const obj = JSON.parse(themes);

root.style.setProperty('--primary', localStorage.getItem('primary'))
root.style.setProperty('--secondary', localStorage.getItem('secondary'));
root.style.setProperty('--elem-color', localStorage.getItem('elem-color'));
root.style.setProperty('--navbar-color', localStorage.getItem('navbar-color') );
root.style.setProperty('--accent-color', localStorage.getItem('accent-color'));
root.style.setProperty('--text', localStorage.getItem('text'));
root.style.setProperty('--shadow-color', localStorage.getItem('shadow-color'));
root.style.setProperty('--scrollbar-color', localStorage.getItem('scrollbar-color'));
root.style.setProperty('--scrollbar-color-hover', localStorage.getItem('scrollbar-color-hover'));
root.style.setProperty('--scrollbar-track-color', localStorage.getItem('scrollbar-track-color'));

const setTheme = (theme) => {
  // console.log(`Chosen theme is ${theme}`)

  let chosenTheme = obj.filter(function(val) {
    if(val.id === theme){

      root.style.setProperty('--primary', val.colors.primary);
      root.style.setProperty('--secondary', val.colors.secondary);
      root.style.setProperty('--elem-color', val.colors.elemColor);
      root.style.setProperty('--navbar-color', val.colors.navbarColor);
      root.style.setProperty('--accent-color', val.colors.accentColor);
      root.style.setProperty('--text', val.colors.text);
      root.style.setProperty('--shadow-color', val.colors.shadowColor);
      root.style.setProperty('--scrollbar-color', val.colors.scrollbarColor);
      root.style.setProperty('--scrollbar-color-hover', val.colors.scrollBarColorHover);
      root.style.setProperty('--scrollbar-track-color', val.colors.scrollBarTrackColor);

      localStorage.setItem('primary', val.colors.primary)
      localStorage.setItem('secondary', val.colors.secondary)
      localStorage.setItem('elem-color', val.colors.elemColor)
      localStorage.setItem('navbar-color', val.colors.navbarColor)
      localStorage.setItem('accent-color', val.colors.accentColor)
      localStorage.setItem('text', val.colors.text)
      localStorage.setItem('shadow-color', val.colors.shadowColor)
      localStorage.setItem('scrollbar-color', val.colors.scrollbarColor)
      localStorage.setItem('scrollbar-color-hover', val.colors.scrollBarColorHover)
      localStorage.setItem('scrollbar-track-color', val.colors.scrollBarTrackColor)
      
    }
  })
}



//////////////////// Slide In //////////////////////

let pageSections = [...document.querySelectorAll('.slide-in')]

const observer = new IntersectionObserver(entries => {
    entries.forEach(entry => {
          entry.target.children[0].classList.toggle('active', entry.isIntersecting)
          // if(entry.isIntersecting) observer.unobserve(entry.target) //prevent from sliding out
    })
  },
  {
      rootMargin: '0%',
      threshold: 0.1,
  }
)

pageSections.forEach(section => {
    observer.observe(section)
})





/////////////////////////////////////////// Skills Horizontal Slider //////////////////////////////////


// window.onload = function(){ 
  const buttonRight = document.getElementById('slideRight');
  const buttonLeft = document.getElementById('slideLeft');

  buttonRight.onclick = function () {
  document.getElementById('scroll-horizontally').scrollLeft += 250;
  };
  buttonLeft.onclick = function () {
  document.getElementById('scroll-horizontally').scrollLeft -= 350;
  };
// };



//////////////////////////////////////////// Contact Me Form ////////////////////////////////////////////////
const nameInput = document.getElementById('name')
const emailInput = document.getElementById('email')
const subjectInput = document.getElementById('subject')
const messageInput = document.getElementById('message-input')
const submit = document.getElementById('submit')
const errorMessage = document.querySelectorAll('.error-message')
const contactForm = document.querySelector('form')
const moreInfo = document.querySelector('.info')
const infoModal = document.querySelector('.info-modal')
const infoModalCloseBtn = document.querySelector('.info-modal_close-btn')

moreInfo.onclick = () => {
  infoModal.style.display = 'block'
}
infoModalCloseBtn.onclick = () => {
  infoModal.style.display = 'none'
}
const validateForm = () =>{
    let errorFlag = false
    if (nameInput.value.length < 1){
        errorMessage[0].innerText = "Name cannot be blank"
        nameInput.classList.add("error-border")
        errorFlag = true
    }
    if (!emailIsValid(emailInput.value)){
        errorMessage[1].innerText = "Email is NOT Valid"
        emailInput.classList.add("error-border")
        errorFlag = true
    }
    if (subjectInput.value.length < 1){
        errorMessage[2].innerText = "Subject cannot be blank"
        subjectInput.classList.add("error-border")
        errorFlag = true
    }
    if (messageInput.value.length < 1){
        errorMessage[3].innerText = "Message cannot be blank"
        messageInput.classList.add("error-border")
        errorFlag = true
    }
    

    nameInput.addEventListener("input", () =>{
        nameInput.classList.remove("error-border")
        errorMessage[0].innerText = ""
    })
    emailInput.addEventListener("input", () =>{
        emailInput.classList.remove("error-border")
        errorMessage[1].innerText = ""
    })
    subjectInput.addEventListener("input", () =>{
        subjectInput.classList.remove("error-border")
        errorMessage[2].innerText = ""
    })
    messageInput.addEventListener("input", () =>{
        messageInput.classList.remove("error-border")
        errorMessage[3].innerText = ""
    })



    if(!errorFlag){
        submit.classList.add('pending')
        setTimeout(() =>{
            submit.classList.remove('pending') 
            submit.classList.add('success')

            setTimeout(() =>{
                submit.classList.remove('success')
                contactForm.reset()
            }, 2000)
        }, 2000)
    }
}


const emailIsValid = (emailInput) =>{
    let pattern = /\S+@\S+\.\S+/;
    return pattern.test(emailInput)
}



//////////////////////////////////////////// Toggle Social Icons //////////////////////////////


let toggleSocialIconsBtn = document.getElementById('toggle-social')
const socialIcons = document.querySelector('.social')
let deg = -90
toggleSocialIconsBtn.onclick = () => {
  socialIcons.classList.toggle('hidesocial')
  deg += 180
  deg >= 270 ? deg = -90 : deg
  toggleSocialIconsBtn.style.transform = `rotate(${deg}deg)`
}


////////////////////////////////////////////// Gmail info box /////////////////////////////
const mailSocialIconToggle = document.getElementById('mail-social-icon')
const gmailInfoBox = document.querySelector('.gmail-info-box')
const copyToClipboardBtn = document.querySelector('.copy-to-clipboard-btn')
const snackbar = document.querySelector('.snackbar')

mailSocialIconToggle.onclick = () => {
  gmailInfoBox.classList.toggle('active')
  
}
copyToClipboardBtn.onclick = () => {
  snackbar.classList.add('active')
  navigator.clipboard.writeText('pawelczarnecki0225@gmail.com');
  
  setTimeout(() =>{
    snackbar.classList.remove('active')
  },2000); 
}

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Scroll To Section
let scrollLocation
const scrollToSection = (section) =>{
  switch (section) {
    case home:
      scrollToTop()
      break;
    case about:
      scrollLocation = document.getElementById('about').scrollIntoView();
    break;
    case skills:
      scrollLocation = document.getElementById('skills').scrollIntoView();
    break;
    case work:
      scrollLocation = document.getElementById('work').scrollIntoView() - 200;
    break;
    case contact:
      scrollLocation = document.getElementById('contact').scrollIntoView();
    break;
    default:
      break;
  }
}





//////////////////////////// Grid/List View //////////////////////////
const gridViewBtn = document.querySelector('.grid-view-btn')
const listViewBtn = document.querySelector('.list-view-btn')
const workCardContainer = document.querySelector('.my-work_card-container')
const cardsContainer = document.querySelector('.cards')
const workCards = document.querySelectorAll('.card')

// toggle card view
gridViewBtn.onclick = () => {
  workCardContainer.classList.remove('list')
  workCardContainer.classList.add('grid')
  listViewBtn.classList.remove('checked')
  gridViewBtn.classList.add('checked')  
  cardsContainer.classList.remove('list-view')
  cardsContainer.classList.add('grid-view')

}
// toggle list view
listViewBtn.onclick = () => {
  workCardContainer.classList.remove('grid')
  workCardContainer.classList.add('list')
  gridViewBtn.classList.remove('checked')
  listViewBtn.classList.add('checked') 
  cardsContainer.classList.remove('grid-view')
  cardsContainer.classList.add('list-view') 
}
// flip card
workCards.forEach(card =>{
  card.onclick = () =>{
    card.classList.toggle('flipped')
  }
})
